name: Slappy Board
description:
Immerse yourself in a presented scenario as you go through 5 different themes with a bunch of slapping opportunities!
Our generated characters and obstacles will keep every playthrough unique.



Progress towards a superslap - for extra damage - !
Use combos and the environment to find new ways to increase your points.



Work your way through rage-inducing obstacles.



Levels are fast-paced, tense and always full of SLAPS!
